input_text:
Job Title: Cybersecurity Architect-ForgeRock Consultant

Location: Alexandria, VA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Senior Cybersecurity Architect – Identity and Access ManagementWe are looking for a Senior Cybersecurity Architect to work full-time on a government contract in the Washington, D.C. area. The initial contract will be for 3-6 months, though the contract may be extended. This is a hybrid role, with at least three days a week on site, and it is a 1099 position (no benefits).
The Senior Cybersecurity Architect will support enterprise cybersecurity by helping to strengthen the overall security posture; planning, deploying, and testing security controls; and developing security policies and procedures. They should have significant experience in identity and access management (IAM), including the creation and implementation of IAM controls. They should also have expertise in ForgeRock and Microsoft Office 365 (O365).
Responsibilities will include:· Applying knowledge of NIST standards.· Developing reference architecture models and conducting architectural assessments.· Reviewing and maintaining the security posture of O365.· Analyzing the current security state, defining the future state, and performing a gap analysis.· Working with business stakeholders to understand current applications and access requirements.· Designing a password-less architecture.· Developing organizational access roles, including privileged access roles.· Develop an access request process.· Ensuring that provisioned access meets mapped access requirements.· Transferring IAM controls to ForgeRock.· Providing initial and ongoing training on the IAM program.·Required qualifications are as follows (please do not apply if you do not meet these criteria):· 10 years’ cybersecurity experience· 3 years’ experience as a Senior Cybersecurity Architect· Bachelor’s degree in information systems, cybersecurity, or business management, or equivalent combination of education and experience· Expertise in IAM and role-based access control· Experience managing an IAM system· Experience with ForgeRock· Experience with O365· Experience with the NIST Cybersecurity and Risk Management Frameworks
Salary: $145,000-$200,000 DOE 
About Securance Consulting:Securance Consulting is an IT professional services firm dedicated to independent assessments of cybersecurity, risk, compliance, and efficiency of IT operations. For more than 22 years, we've helped clients leverage the Advantage of Insight to safeguard data, mitigate risks, and align their security programs with business objectives.Securance provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment and prohibits discrimination and harassment of any type without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, national origin, disability status, genetics, protected veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state or local laws.This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment, including recruiting, hiring, placement, promotion, termination, layoff, recall, transfer, leaves of absence, compensation, and training

Experience Level (if available): None

Reviewing and maintaining the security posture of O365
Analyzing the current security state, defining the future state, and performing a gap analysis
Working with business stakeholders to understand current applications and access requirements
Developing organizational access roles, including privileged access roles
Ensuring that provisioned access meets mapped access requirements
Providing initial and ongoing training on the IAM program
